com.brownian.morse

Class TextStreamMorsePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • com.brownian.morse.MorseSoundingLabel
              • com.brownian.morse.TextStreamMorsePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class TextStreamMorsePanel
extends MorseSoundingLabel
    A JLabel that displays text from a Stream, and sounds that text out in Morse using a LatinReceiverAsync.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextStreamMorsePanel(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> textStream)
      Creates a TextStreamMorsePanel that receives text from the given Stream and sends it to be sounded out to the default LatinReceiverAsync.
      TextStreamMorsePanel(java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> textStream, LatinReceiverAsync latinReceiverAsync)
      Creates a TextStreamMorsePanel that receives text from the given Stream and sends it to be sounded out to the given LatinReceiverAsync.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TextStreamMorsePanel

        public TextStreamMorsePanel(@NotNull
                            java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> textStream,
                            @NotNull
                            LatinReceiverAsync latinReceiverAsync)
        Creates a TextStreamMorsePanel that receives text from the given Stream and sends it to be sounded out to the given LatinReceiverAsync.
        Parameters:
        latinReceiverAsync - the LatinReceiverAsync to sound out whatever text is generated and displayed.
        textStream - the Stream used to supply text for this object.

      • TextStreamMorsePanel

        public TextStreamMorsePanel(@NotNull
                            java.util.stream.Stream<java.lang.String> textStream)
                     throws javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException
        Creates a TextStreamMorsePanel that receives text from the given Stream and sends it to be sounded out to the default LatinReceiverAsync.
        Parameters:
        textStream - the Stream used to supply text for this object.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException - if MIDI cannot be used to generate sounds
        See Also:
        LatinReceiverAsync.getReceiver()

    • Method Detail

      • play

        public void play()
        Starts consuming text from the underlying Stream, if not already doing that. If all of the text has been consumed, nothing happens. This text is both displayed and sounded out. This method is idempotent.
        See Also:
        pause()

      • pause

        public void pause()
        Stops generating new text. Continues displaying and sounding out whatever text is currently displayed. This method is idempotent.
        See Also:
        play()
